sentences.english: Third Officer, please inform Chief Engineer of standby engine by 1300 LT.
sentences.chinese: 三副，请通知轮机长在当地时间1300时前备车。

sentences.english: Cooper let Sha Funa take him to the captain there.
sentences.chinese: 库珀让沙夫娜带他到机长那儿。

sentences.english: But the captain has decided to land at an alternate airport nearby.
sentences.chinese: 不过机长已经决定在附近的备降机场着陆。

sentences.english: Allow flight attendants to the captain explained to her that she could only sit general compartment.
sentences.chinese: 机长让空姐去对她解释她只能坐普通舱。

sentences.english: The difference between a Captain and a First Officer is that the captain will have been with the company longer.
sentences.chinese: 机长和副驾驶的区别就在于，机长在该公司呆得更久。

sentences.english: The difference between a Captain and a First Officer is that the captain will have been with the company longer.
sentences.chinese: 机长和副驾驶的区别就在于，机长在该公司呆得更久。

sentences.english: I do hope your chief engineer could see me on Friday morning.
sentences.chinese: 我真希望你们轮机长星期五早晨能见我。

sentences.english: SOEs, they don’t like us to grab their captains.
sentences.chinese: 国有企业，他们不愿意我们管理他们的机长。

sentences.english: Ms. Wang said that the captain did not wait for an apology to passengers, then said.
sentences.chinese: 王女士说，这期间没有等到机长向乘客们说道歉的话。

sentences.english: Surprised, the flight attendant and the co-pilot asked the captain what he had said to her.
sentences.chinese: 空姐和副驾驶都感到吃惊，问机长对她说了些什么。

sentences.english: Chief Engineer, please standby engine by 1600 UTC.
sentences.chinese: 轮机长，请在协调世界时1600时前备车。

sentences.english: The copilot returned to the cockpit and asked the captain what he should do.
sentences.chinese: 副机长回到驾驶室请示机长该怎么做。

sentences.english: The copilot returned to the cockpit and asked the captain what he should do.
sentences.chinese: 副机长回到驾驶室请示机长该怎么做。

sentences.english: Will you take me to the Chief Engineer ?
sentences.chinese: 你能带我去见轮机长吗？

sentences.english: Inform Chief Engineer of entering anchorage.
sentences.chinese: 通知轮机长准备进锚地。

sentences.english: The captain was later diagnosed with sleep apnoea.
sentences.chinese: 机长后来被诊断患有睡眠呼吸中止症。

definition: abbr. for 空中小姐/stewardess/air hostess/female flight attendant
attendant on an airplane, train, boat etc

pinyin: kong1 zhong1 jiao1 tong1 guan3 zhi4 yuan2

definition: the rear (tail) of a plane etc
